author: thecatalystschool
title: Insight Sharing Workshops - TCS
description: The Catalyst members struggle to take full advantage of the Insight Sharing stage to improve their awareness about challenges.
solution: Host challenge-specific workshops with domain experts and in collaboration with Challenge Team during the Insight Sharing stage.
experience: Veteran advisors and proposal mentors, education professionals, very active Catalyst community members since early Funds and more.
